I found this site from Google, and it seems to contain pretty much of necessary info for you.

http://www.borden.forces.gc.ca/cfb_borden/index_e.asp

It's about 100 km north of Toronto - i.e. not much related with Toronto at all. The only thing I know about Simcoe County is that I went on a summer camping trip there a few years ago.

There seems to be two easy options: either use their Taxi service or rent a car from the Pearson airport, whichever costs less. You might want to call now and make a reservation either way. Also it may be a good idea to order a map (about $7.50) for your driving if you choose so.

Hope this helps.
P.S. There is a COSKA annual meeting on 3/25 so you may attend if you'd like. It is posted on our homepage as you may already know.
